description: SDM4FZI_Arena2036-specific request for a simulation run.

alternatives.description:
The alternative to be simulated.
This is an array, however it should currently contain only a single alternative.
alternatives.title: alternatives

items.description: SDM4FZI_Arena2036-specific alternative for which to execute a simulation run.
items.title: SDM4FZI_Arena2036_SimulationRequestAlternative

nodeDataArray.description: List of nodes in this model

linkDataArray.description: List of links in this model

id.description: ID of the project this simulation job belongs to
id.title: id

settings.description: Various settings for the simulation run
settings.title: settings

simulationStartDate.description:
Start date of the simulation (ISO 8601).
Should be specified as UTC at midnight (00:00:00Z).
simulationStartDate.title: simulationStartDate

simulationEndDate.description:
End date of the simulation (ISO 8601).
Should be specified as UTC at midnight (00:00:00Z).
simulationEndDate.title: simulationEndDate

initialStatsOffsetInHours.description: Initial offset in hours after which the stats will be recorded.
initialStatsOffsetInHours.title: initialStatsOffsetInHours

simulationApiVersion.description: API version of the backend simulation model
simulationApiVersion.title: simulationApiVersion

userLanguage.description: Current language of the user (two-letter language code)
userLanguage.title: userLanguage

randomNumbersVariant.description: Random seed to initialize the pseudorandom number generator.
randomNumbersVariant.title: randomNumbersVariant

items.description: Parameter with support for duration values.
items.title: Part Source_v_tiCycleTime_Parameter

class.description: Identifier for the parameter, used to find the parameter definition in the toolbox
class.title: class

key.description: The unique key of the node
key.title: key

loc.description:
The location of the node in the diagram.
Format of this property is the x-coordinate, a space, and then the y-coordinate (e.g. "0 0" or "-200 400").
Increasing values of x are going rightwards and increasing values of y are going downwards.
loc.title: loc

category.description: Specifies the category, used for determining the visual template to use.
category.title: category

class.description: Specifies a unique identifier which describes the current node type (e.g. process, store or customer).
class.title: class

photoNames.description: File names of the attached photos
photoNames.title: photoNames

imageClass.description: Identifier for determining the node icon from the toolbox to be used.
imageClass.title: imageClass

imageTransform.description: Transformation options for the node icon.
imageTransform.title: imageTransform

flipY.description: Flag if this icon should be flipped vertically.
flipY.title: flipY

flipX.description: Flag if this icon should be flipped horizontally.
flipX.title: flipX

scale.description: Scale of the image. Default scale is 1.
scale.title: scale

angle.description: The rotation angle of the image (Value between 0 and 360)
angle.title: angle

parameterTableLayout.description: Layout options for the parameter table
parameterTableLayout.title: parameterTableLayout

labelColumnWidth.description: The width of the label column
labelColumnWidth.title: labelColumnWidth

valueColumnWidth.title: valueColumnWidth
